1.content:
It was early in the morning. The birds chirped outside and you woke up by the sunlight shinning right into your face. A feeling of happiness overcame you, but it was short lived by the knock on the door. "Dont forget to help your sister with her project today" you heard your mom say before she exits the house. You mumbled something and stood up. You made yoir way slowly to your door still in your pj's. You walked towards your sisters room reading the note which was stuck on her wooden door. "Experiments held. No civilians allowed" stood on it. You had to chuckled wondering why your sis is still so childsh sometimes. You knocked on the door and a voice said "no civilians please use password!" You sighed and knocked the theme from one of her fav games.

"You are allowed to enter the lab asistant!" The voice said as you entered the room. You walked into the room as a whiff of parfume and a touch of sweat hit your nose. You looked around and you couldnt see your sister anywhere. You close the door and then you felt a sting on your neck. You turned your head seeing your sister with a wide smile on her face pushing a strange liquid into your neck with a syringe. You jumped and fell on the floor. "ARE YOU CRAZY YOU CANT JUST PUT A STRANGE LQUID IN MY BODY WITHOUT MY CONSENT. I COULD FRICKN DIE FROM IT" you yelled at her. You looked at the girl. Her chocolate brown eyes soothed you down. You quickly felt sorry for yelling at her and a quiet "sorry.." came from your mouth.

You felt strange. You feel like having limb pain. "Whats your experiment anyways?" You asked your sister trying to stay calm.
"Im testing a new kind of gene manipulating liquid that allows the host to turn into lifeless object the human eyes wont see the diffrence in. Mixing that with another serum that allows me to control your body will give me the perfect test subject to make my endurance tests i need to prove that its safe and secure to use" she said in an almost cold voice. You couldnt believe what you heard. You felt weaker and weaker as your eyes slowly shut. "Of course i wont do these tests by myself. I have other still human volunteers that will do that for me to really bring you to the -" it was all you could understandt before passing out.

Aftee you woke up your body was..
1.title: What a nice sibling you are

choices: She gives you to her boyfriend
She gives you to another friend
She stuffs you in her leather boots
11.content: "Transformation one completed. A pair of socks to test durability and absorbation was successful. Bringing subject to test person now" your sister said as she lift you up and went outside. You paniced as your conciousness was still active and you could do nothing to change back. Your sister brought you to a small house. You could hear rock music playing from the inside. Your sister knocked on the door and natasha The school bully opened the door. "The fuck you wa- oh hi are you here bc of the sock test?" Nat asked. Your whole world crumbled in pieces. Nat hated you. She hated almos everyone. Just the thought of even smelling her feet was a nightmare "yes here they are" she said as she passes you to her "hell yeahhhh new socks to ruin baby. Babe! We are gonna have fun tonight!" She said as she locked the door
11.title: A pair of socks

info.brief_description: Your sister wants to do a science experiment and you have to help her
info.description:
This is an semi- unaware story( your sister is the only one knowing about this)

Your sister is a young 17 year old girl with brown long hair, brown eyes and round glasses. She was pretty smar for her age and she has a very futuristic experiment she wants to do.

Please add uwu
